fields.name: Banner of Command
fields.description: +200 Health +60 Ability Power +20 Magic Resist +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Aura - Legion: Grants nearby allies +20 Magic Resist and +75% Base Health Regen. UNIQUE Active - Promote: Greatly increases the power of a lane minion and grants it immunity to magic damage (120 second cooldown). (Unique Auras with the same name do not stack.)
